Services and Packages

Congrats on getting this far!

With tech ever-evolving, and showing no sign of slowing down, we understand it is getting harder and harder to switch off from work. With that in mind, we take a personalised, bespoke approach to managing your time efficiently.

Many areas of life are outsourceable; your weekly online shop, keeping a zero inbox, calendar management, reminders of important life events or of course professional assistance; we are here to take those tasks off your hands to help you to achieve your goals whether growing your business, attending classes or making more time for your family!

Our Services

Business Support

Recruitment, sales, HR admin, Social Media - let us know what you need.

Startup Management

Starting a new business is tough! Luckily we have lots of experience in this and can support you, introduce and streamline your business and introduce the tools you need to kick off.

Lifestyle

Travel, gifting, household management - here so you can focus on the things that matter.

Virtual Assistant

Your very own virtual Executive Assistant without the costs or commitment of an employee.

Package 1

Bespoke Retainer Packages

For those who would like their very own Upsourcer each month, you will have:

● Packages starting at 10 hours per month

● As little as £30 an hour

● Your own named Upsourcer - (recruited, vetted, insured and ICO registered)

● A set number of hours dedicated to YOU each month

● Billed in advance each month to assist with budgeting

● Caroline available to support you and oversee your success with us

Package 2

Project package

Caroline’s background in events, startups and customer and account management means her specialities also include:

● Client management

● Project management

● Event

Package 3

By the hour - Ad hoc

● Get in touch here if there is a one off task you need an extra pair of hands with

● We use time tracking software and can provide a quote for your task

Additional Support

Extras

We can look into providing the below for you as part of your service at a higher rate:

● Holiday / sick cover

● Onsite cover

● Emergency cover

● Out of hours support

● Example services

● Accounts assistant

● Email Management

● Diary Management

● Marketing / Social Media support

● Minute taking

● Research

● Travel support

● Project management

● Event management

● HR admin

● Recruitment

● Presentation building

● Personal and life admin

● Sale
